about_the_game:
The new game is expected to officially launch in February 2025. Please bear with me as I slowly update the introduction for a better in-game experience.
I apologize for disappearing for so long without a word. Due to my personality and some health issues, I haven’t had the courage to open new reviews or interact with people.
I want to apologize to everyone who has reached out. I’ve been neglecting your messages and I’m truly sorry.
For this reason, I stopped developing the original game and switched to the current theme, which took more time. Once it's released, you'll understand the reason.
I apologize again, as I still don't have the courage to open new conversations. If you continue to leave messages, you may still not receive a reply.
I'll reply as soon as I feel better.
Apologize again.
detailed_description:
The new game is expected to officially launch in February 2025. Please bear with me as I slowly update the introduction for a better in-game experience.
I apologize for disappearing for so long without a word. Due to my personality and some health issues, I haven’t had the courage to open new reviews or interact with people.
I want to apologize to everyone who has reached out. I’ve been neglecting your messages and I’m truly sorry.
For this reason, I stopped developing the original game and switched to the current theme, which took more time. Once it's released, you'll understand the reason.
I apologize again, as I still don't have the courage to open new conversations. If you continue to leave messages, you may still not receive a reply.
I'll reply as soon as I feel better.
Apologize again.
name: For Stella

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any cpu produced last 5 years
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphic card produced last 5 years
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Any cpu produced last 4 years
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphic card produced last 4 years
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

short_description: A lovestory between a loner and an avoidant.
